mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(username, account, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{username}, #{account}, #{status}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, account, username, status, create_time, update_time from sys_user where id = #{id};
select id, account, username, status, create_time, update_time from sys_user;
